message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $15,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Can you meet me at this price?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget considerations, but $15,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $11,000? I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to make a serious decision today.
